content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-79

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=8.5)
Generates electricity using steam power. The boiler was refueled in Step 75. Power is currently active (Steam Engine status: WORKING in Step 79 log).
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Fueled with coal)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (fluid_system=12653, starting at x=-8.5, y=-0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (fluid_system=12655, starting at x=-3.5, y=3.5)

### Coal Mining and Chest Storage at (x=29.5, y=18.5) to (x=30.5, y=20.5)
Mines coal and stores it in a wooden chest. An inserter moves coal from the drill's output position to the chest.
Consists of:
- Electric Mining Drill at (x=29.5, y=18.5) (Mining coal)
- Wooden Chest at (x=29.5, y=20.5) (Storing coal)
- Inserter at (x=30.5, y=20.5) (Moves coal from drill output to chest, currently blocked)

### Crude Oil Extraction and Refining at (x=17.5, y=40.5) to (x=40.5, y=66.5)
Extracts crude oil, transports it via pipes, stores it temporarily, refines it into petroleum gas, and stores the gas.
Consists of:
- PumpJack at (x=17.5, y=40.5) (Extracting crude oil)
- StorageTank at (x=25.5, y=43.5) (Storing crude oil)
- Oil Refinery at (x=30.5, y=63.5) (Processing crude oil into petroleum gas)
- StorageTank at (x=40.5, y=66.5) (Storing petroleum gas)
- PipeGroup
